title: Plat 4 Support main LF ADC duo
body:
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}} 

Been a support main since season 2 looking for an ADC main to climb with.
I main Janna, Sona, Morgana and Braum but play all the supports.
Having a working microphone would be a great as I prefer to be on teamspeak and build synergy and what not,

Add me in game on Scyther Bot

[](http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=scyther+bot)

replies.body: Hey Arrabbiata, I have added you in game and looking forward to speaking with you, thanks.

Hey mate, I created a discussion quite recently (2:28 am 2016-04-07) about creating a team for ranked Plat rank only. See discussion for full details.

My IGN is Arrabbiata, I am Plat 4 JG main

I have an ADC in the team already, an ADC main since season 2. 

We use Discord/Skype for communication. 

I am currently looking for a support to join us, If you are interested.
